attributes.action: Free prescriptions for life saveing drug useres
attributes.additional_details: I would like to see free prescriptions for person who need to take tablets every day, just to continue working and living a normal life. I suffer from a sleep disorder called narcolepsy, and to carry out a normal every job I need to take 6 dexadrine tablets a day just to stay awake. My wife has to take thyroxine everyday also. Her drugs are given to her free of charge where as I have to pay for mine. If I didn't take mine, I couldn't function at all. Please debate this I feel it is a totaly acceptable request
